stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Tampa, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Tampa are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Florida law caps single-payment payday loans at $500 with a maximum fee of 10% of the loan amount, plus a $5 verification fee. For installment payday loans, the maximum is $1,000 with fees capped at 8% of the outstanding balance on a biweekly basis.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Tampa must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Tampa Bay Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Ybor City location? We also serve these nearby cities:

faq.question: Where is your Tampa cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Tampa branch is located at 1825 East 7th Avenue, Suite 200, in the historic Ybor City district. We're easily accessible from I-75 Exit 252 or I-275 Exit 41, making us convenient for customers throughout Hillsborough County.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Tampa location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. No appointment needed - just walk in!

faq.question: Can I get a cash advance in Tampa if I have poor credit?
faq.answer: Yes! We don't do traditional credit checks. As long as you have a steady income, valid ID, and no other outstanding payday loan in Florida (verified through the statewide database), you can qualify.

faq.question: What documents do I need to bring to the Tampa location?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government-issued ID, proof of income (recent paystub or bank statement), and proof of a checking account. Our staff will walk you through the application process.

faq.question: How long does it take to get approved at the Tampa branch?
faq.answer: Most customers get approved within 15-30 minutes and can leave with cash the same day. We're fast so you can handle your emergency right away.
